DestinationPartyId.label: Corevest Purchase
DestinationPartyId.description: Send on the QuoteAccepted if the "Refinance/Acquisition" is "Acquisition".

DestinationPartyId.label: Corevest Refinance
DestinationPartyId.description: Send on the QuoteAccepted if the "Refinance/Acquisition" is "Refinance".

inquiryType.label: Revised Quote
inquiryType.description: CV to use when submiting the OrderInquiry for a revised quote

inquiryType.label: Uncancel Bulk
inquiryType.description: If the Bulk Loan Portfolio has been cancelled and CoreVest wants to re-use the same loan number, then please submit a OrderInquiry with this inquiry type and also send the LoanPortfolioChangeRequest with all properties (PropertyAddRemoveReAct=RE-ACTIVATED).

PropertyAddRemoveReAct.label: Property Added
PropertyAddRemoveReAct.description: A property has been added to the Bulk Loan Portfolio

PropertyAddRemoveReAct.label: Property Removed
PropertyAddRemoveReAct.description: A property has been removed from the Bulk Loan Portfolio

PropertyAddRemoveReAct.label: Property Re-Activated
PropertyAddRemoveReAct.description: A property has been re-activated on the Bulk Loan Portfolio

PropertyAddRemoveReAct.label: Property Re-Submitted
PropertyAddRemoveReAct.description: A property has been re-submitted on the Bulk Loan Portfolio. This property was originally submitted on the QuoteAccepted schema but had errors, ServiceLink sent a "FAIL" status on the QuoteReceivedConfirm. CoreVest corrected the data and re-submitted on the LoanPortfolioChangeRequest.
